inventory.commentary: 22Feb08 update to wn2.1, added sense 2, added features ahouston

sense.name: official discussion aimed at reaching an agreement
sense.commentary: NEGOTIATION[+event][+speech_act][+discussion][+official][+goal_oriented][+attain_agreement] dialogue, talks - a discussion intended to produce an agreement
sense.examples: The buyout negotiation lasted several days. The diplomats attempted to keep the negotiations proceeding, despite the incident. Negotiations between labor and management have resulted in a new contract.

sense.name: the act of successful maneuvering
sense.examples: John's negotiation of a paid 3-month sabbatical for himself caused envy and awe in his coworkers. The skater's negotiation of the ice was spectacular. The negotiation of an ordinary car around these turns at high speed would be very difficult.
